transcript.text: which batch alone this is Daniel John
Lee with tor restoration ministries
you're looking at a photo that I took
this evening as Sabbath was beginning in
the Sun was setting on this Friday night
April the 20th 2018 the first Sabbath of
the brand-new year I just wanted to
share a real quick
testimony I was out and about all day
preparing for the Sabbath running
errands paying bills buying groceries
and all the things that I do typically
on our Friday to prepare for Sabbath and
after I had finished all my projects and
cleaning the apartment and done
everything I I drove over to the library
because I was trying to upload my
earlier youtube that I had done on
mirror images at the feast days my
internet here at home goes really slow
so whenever I film a YouTube with my
phone it's a lot easier to get it to
upload a lot faster if I go to the
library so I was sitting sort of in the
outer lobby area of the library and I
was waiting for my video to upload and
I'm not gonna say I was feeling like
really bad or anything maybe I was a
little down just because of some things
that had been of my life I don't really
want to get into in this video but
anyway suffice to say I was sitting
there and all of a sudden this guy this
older guy walks into the library he has
this very thick white beard it looks
like he's almost wearing like a Jewish
keepo type of Jewish hat he's wearing a
Star of David around his neck and he he
walks up to me and he says excuse me I
know this is gonna sound maybe weird to
you or whatever but I just felt like I
needed to come over and tell you that
Jesus loves you and of course as soon as
he said that I was just I smiled and I
said well I'm I'm I'm actually a
Messianic guy I love Yahshua very much
and he repeated oh yes yeah Joshua and I
said yeah yeah she would do it anyway we
wound up having a brief conversation and
I shared with them that I'm actually
thinking of starting a a home fellowship
from my apartment I hope to eventually
advertise but but I'd like to start a
home Sabbath fellowship as an outreach
to the community where I'm living here
in Alaska and maybe you'd like to join
me and he said yeah sure so I I wound up
giving him a card to my website and then
he gave me his name and his phone number
and I plug that into my phone but it was
just so wonderful because I didn't even
realize that I I was feeling that bad or
that I needed to be lifted up but it's
like yah loves us so much I mean when
we're walking and covenant with him when
we're obeying him when we're keeping his
Commandments I'm doing all we can to
serve Him he he wants to pour himself
out to us so much I mean he even loves
sinners those who are walking contrary
to who he is
how much more do you think he loves
those who are truly trying to seek Him
and walk close to him but he just loves
us so much and he's just reminded me
that even when I I didn't even realize I
needed a pick-me-up he sends this guy
out of the blue just to tell me how much
he loves me and I just wanted to share
that as a testimony that Yahshua he's so
good yeah father is so good Abba yah is
just he's always looking out for
children and I just want to praise and
thank publicly my the Yabba ver Hamid
sock and Yaakov for sending that
encouragement to me this preparation now
you all have a very blessed shabbat
shalom website spirit and tour calm
shabbat shalom
